Name: costrutto
About the game: Costrutto is only about building your dream House, placing block to block. Choose your style from 4 different settings and more than 30+ variations. There is no particular essence of the game. Just keep calm & build to the relaxing Lo-Fi music. Gameplay You are on an unoccupied building area in the middle of nowhere the only thing you can do is Build ! Setting There are 4 different settings with different styles in it. German - build medieval Altstadt houses, American - bring to the live one of the most recognisible suburbs, Italian - raise structures in the style of Venice from the beautiful waters of Italy, Mexican - complete the simple-looking cribs which are very colorful. Athmosphere The feeling you are getting from playing the Costrutto is freedom of everything. You can raise all the structures you've ever imagined.
